page.title: 07HONLEY SHOW
page.content: Honley Show is held on the 2nd Saturday in June. At the Show there are different animals; shire-horses, ponies, sheep, rabbits, dogs, goats and many more. In the marquees there are refreshments, ice-creams and the tantalizing odour of hot-dogs and beef-burgers. Some people come just for the enjoyment and fun, but others come for prizes and rosettes. Show jumping is a feature of the show, as indeed is the amusing joke-shop. The show has a reputed guarantee of inclement weather. However, the last two occasions have been fine. The Honley Show, which has much to delight the whole family, is held in the fields nestled between the Meltham Road and Bradshaw Road.
